question: Darcus Howe, the well-known black power activist has passed away. He hailed from which country?
explanation: Darcus Howe (74), one of the most prominent black activists of his generation in Britain, has recently passed away in London, United Kingdom. He was best known in the UK for his Black on Black series on Channel 4; his current affairs programme, Devil\'s Advocate; and his work with Tariq Ali on “Bandung Fil”.
